sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts Squad Live Fire Exercise from 28 July 2023–30 July 2023 at Range 204 IOT train and certify rifle squads in fire and maneuver in preparation for Saber Junction 2023.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this live fire is to build on PLT LFX ’23 to certify Squads in preparation for Saber Junction 2023.
sections.SUSTAINMENT:
, Fires)
Validate Rifle Squads under Blank and Live Fire (day/night) conditions
Challenge Squad Leader synchronization of AT and vehicle lethality
Platoon Leaders issue PLT OPORD, Squad Leaders issue SQD OPORD
sections.END STATE:
All Bull Troop Infantry Squads are certified for fire and maneuver operations in a tactical environment.
Training Objectives:
Conduct Deliberate TLPs
Conduct a Squad Attack
Synchronize mounted/dismounted maneuver
Call For Fire
Conduct Field Maintenance
8x lanes
100 m
Resourcing
CLI: A-M-A Rations Cycle
CLIII: Fuel Truck requested on 30JUL23 to prep for mvmt to PLT STX lanes
CLIV: Pallets, Tarps, 5 strands of C-Wire Needed
CLV: pending
CLVIII: HHT 72 with crew standing by
Misc: 2x Fire extinguishers needed (coordinating with DISTRO)
Back Side Support
Safeties: 5 NCOs x2 safeties with each Fire Team x1 Safety w/ driver following Stryker in B4A (JLTV)
Ammo Point: x1 NCO x4 Soldiers
Gate Guard: x2 Soldiers
Medical Support: HHT-72 (SGT Bogier)
